**Project Overview**
-------------------

A bridge deck rehabilitation project, including miscellaneous repairs to different structures along the Alaska Highway. The project locations include:

*   Bougie Creek Bridge (Km 357.4)
*   Lower Liard Bridge (Km 763.3)
*   Hyland River Bridge (Km 937.3)
